title: 820-3437 No backlight but boost is present
message: I have an another 820-3437 with no backlight, but I have 40V one side of D7701 and 8.5V on the other. does this mean it is not seeing the screen??

title: 820-3437 No backlight but boost is present
message: Good chance that is a bad LCD or cable. Try another assembly.

title: 820-3437 No backlight but boost is present
820-3437 No backlight but boost is present
message: tried another assembly still no backlight

title: 820-3437 No backlight but boost is present
message: 40v means it is not seeing the screen. I bet the connector is bad, OR, the voltage is not making its way to the connector.

title: 820-3437 No backlight but boost is present
message:
You should see 25-27v on a working air backlight circuit at the end. 

You see 40v at D7701, but what do you see right on pins 3 and 4 of the LCD connector?

If you have 40v at pins 3/4 of the LCD connector, the connector is probably broken internally and not sending that to the screen.
